deal_breakers: Lack of essential features like NFC or wireless charging
Incompatibility with my existing accessories (like chargers or cases)

technical: I think it should have a good camera, but I'm not sure what specs are important
Maybe something that has fast charging? I heard that's good.
non_technical: I need it to be user-friendly, but I'm not clear on what that means.
It should feel nice in my hand, but I don't know how to evaluate that.
I heard brand reputation is important, but I can't say why.

must_meet: It should fit my budget, which is kind of flexible but also strict?
I think it must be reliable, but I'm not certain how to define that.
should_meet: A decent battery life would be good, but what counts as decent?
I think having some latest features is nice, but I can't specify which ones.
nice_to_meet: If it has a sleek design, that would be cool, but I'm not picky.
I would appreciate if it works with my old accessories, but I don't remember what I have.
